title: Who won The Circle 2019? Paddy Smyth gets emotional as he is announced winner
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Paddy Smyth has won The Circle 2019 in the live final.

Emma Willis hosted the show on Channel 4 for the final time this year as the finalists prepared to see who came out on top.

In a game where anyone can be anyone, players of the show live in the same building but reside in completely different apartments.

But the players never meet face to face and communicate only via social media platform The Circle in a bid to be voted the most popular by other contestants.

The five finalists - Tim, Woody, Georgina, Sammie and Paddy - competed for the final prize and ranked each other in order of their favourite to least favourite people.

After placing their votes, the contestants finally met each other face-to-face for the first time.

Viewers watched as the finalists met and Sammie was revealed as catfisher James.

As it came to the results, Paddy took home the crown as announced by host Emma Willis.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

Paddy looked ecstatic and totally overwhelmed with emotions as he accepted the win.

The winner then watched how the other contestants rated him.

He told Emma: "I never thought I'd make it past the beginning, especially as I came in as a late player

"I came in with such insecurities and that circle accepted me."

(Image: Channel 4)

The winner, Paddy, voted by the other finalists, has now taken home £70,000.

The Viewers' Champion (voted by the viewers), Tim, also received £30,000 from the prize fund.

Zoe Ball and Fatboy Slim's son Woody finished in fifth place, while Tim, finished in fourth place.

Taking third place was catfish player Sammie, AKA James, and Georgina was the runner up.
description: The Circle 2019 final saw Paddy Smyth win the show which was hosted live by Emma Willis, and viewers were pleased with the result
